features.name: Graph Editor
features.description: Visual editor for designing LangGraph agents using React Flow. Supports Drag & Drop of nodes.

features.name: RAG Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard for managing RAG knowledge base, uploading documents, and testing retrieval.

features.name: MCP Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard for managing MCP server connections and viewing available tools.

features.name: Fine-tuning Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard for creating and monitoring fine-tuning jobs.

features.name: Backend API
features.description: FastAPI backend providing endpoints for all services.
